book.title: Robot Dreams (Robot #0.4)
book.description: Storyline: Robot Dreams (Robot 0.4) Robot Dreams collects 21 of Isaac Asimov's short stories spanning the body of his fiction from the 1940s to the 1980s----exploring not only the future of technology, but the future of humanity's maturity and growth.
book.author: Isaac Asimov
